languages.text: "Хотя, если что, тут куча мест, где можно спрятаться получше и пересидеть, пока пронесет..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Если честно, я думаю что в случае чего постараюсь спрятаться куда-нибудь подальше, авось пронесет

languages.text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."
languages.original_text: "Хотя, если что, тут куча мест, где можно спрятаться получше и пересидеть, пока пронесет..."

traits.locale_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."
"Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."
"Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

languages.text: “不过，如果事情真的走到了那一步，这里有很多边边角角的地方。你可以躲起来，等待风声过去……”
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果事情真的走到了那一步，这里有很多边边角角的地方。你可以躲起来，等待风声过去……”

languages.text: «Aunque, ahora que lo pienso, aquí hay rincones y esquinas de sobra para esconderse y esperar a que pase...».
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque, ahora que lo pienso, aquí hay rincones y esquinas de sobra para esconderse y esperar a que pase...».

languages.text: 「だがそう言えば、この場所には隅のあちこちに、隠れて待機できそうな場所がたくさんあるな…」
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: 「だがそう言えば、この場所には隅のあちこちに、隠れて待機できそうな場所がたくさんあるな…」

languages.text: "Obwohl, genau betrachtet gibt es durchaus viele Ecken hier, wo man sich verstecken und abwarten könnte ..."
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: "Obwohl, genau betrachtet gibt es durchaus viele Ecken hier, wo man sich verstecken und abwarten könnte ..."

languages.text: « Remarque, si jamais c'est nécessaire, il y a de nombreux coins et recoins par ici. On pourrait trouver une cachette et laisser passer l'orage... »
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: « Remarque, si jamais c'est nécessaire, il y a de nombreux coins et recoins par ici. On pourrait trouver une cachette et laisser passer l'orage... »

languages.text: "Gerektiği takdirde burada bol bol delik ve izbe yer var, saklanıp her şeyin bitmesini bekleyebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Although, if it came to it, there are plenty of nooks and crannies in this place, spots where you could hide and wait it out..."

traits.locale_text: "Gerektiği takdirde burada bol bol delik ve izbe yer var, saklanıp her şeyin bitmesini bekleyebilirsin."
